Assoc. Prof. Luong Chi Mai
IOIT Deputy Director
It is my great pleasure to convey the greetings of Institute of Information Technology (IOIT) to all colleagues and friends in AI3-SOI community.
IOIT, belonging to Vietnamese Academy of Science and Technology (VAST), was founded in 1976 with the mission of research and development of IT in Vietnam.

As an Internet technology pioneer in Vietnam IOIT introduced Internet into Vietnam in early 90s, and joined AI3 in 1996. From December 1998 IOIT officially became a full member of AI3, with the Decision of the Government of Vietnam (Decision No 1122/QD-TTg) to grant IOIT to carry out the AI3-VN project.

10 years have past since early days of AI3, IOIT has enjoyed not only helpful support and co-operation from Japanese and ASEAN colleagues but also an enduring multinational friendship which is very unique in international co-operation.

In Vietnam the AI3-SOI 10th anniversary marks a new development: VINAREN (Vietnam Research and Educational Network) is taking shape and other academic institutions such as Hanoi University of Technology, College of Technology of Vietnam National University are joining AI3-SOI activities.

This year AI3-SOI will celebrates its 10th and 5th anniversaries, we'll also celebrate our institute 30th annivesary with one of its major archivement is in computer networking field in Vietnam, in which the AI3-SOI contributes one of the most remarkable importance. By this occasion we wish AI3-SOI and all colleagues and friends more and more success.
